name: The Thrill of the Loan
description:
Ludum Dare 45 - Start With Nothing

  • Adam Ward (Artist)
  • Timothy Frye (Programmer)
  • Trevor McDonald (Programmer)

Hit space (or click) to start the game, advance text, stop the persuasion bar, and select your options! W/S or up/down to choose which option you'd like.

Font used: https://fontstruct.com/fontstructions/show/1581047

Music generated with: https://pernyblom.github.io/abundant-music/index.html

Sound effects generated with: http://www.drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html
